name: Vmeals
overview:
Vmeals is a web-based application for business people who order delivered group meals for meetings and events. The Vmeals website features menus from more than 1,400 local restaurants and caterers in 31 metropolitan East Coast and Midwest markets. Vmeals customers include Fortune 1000 offices, professional services firms (investment banking, law, accounting, technology, consulting, and training), pharmaceutical sales reps, colleges, non-profits, and medical centers.

The Vmeals system handles all aspects of the delivered meal transaction â€“ marketing, customer acquisition, menu presentation, pricing, order processing, payment, and customer service â€“ except the actual preparation, delivery, and presentation of the food. Vmeals customers can place a single group order or allow meeting participants to order from a selected menu. Vmeals provides organizations a way to efficiently source and manage their food spend by providing centralized access to a variety of menus, billing, oversight and reporting.
